fields.value: Data for 'Testing the effects of four urbanization “filters” on forest plant taxonomic, functional, and phylogenetic diversity'

dsDescriptionValue.value: This data includes plant species' relative abundances and taxonomic, functional, and phylogenetic diversity measures (richness and Rao's Quadratic entropy); categorical trait information and phylogeny used to calculate diversity measures; and environmental data used as model predictors. Data was collected in riparian forest in the Research Triangle area of North Carolina, USA in 2012-2014.

files.description: Categorical traits used to calculate functional diversity (see publication for sources). Continuous trait data came from TRY database. Wetland Indicator Status ranges from 1-5 (1=Upland, 5=Obligate Wetland)
files.label: Lopezetal2018_categorical_traits.tab

dataFile.description: Categorical traits used to calculate functional diversity (see publication for sources). Continuous trait data came from TRY database. Wetland Indicator Status ranges from 1-5 (1=Upland, 5=Obligate Wetland)

files.description: Taxonomic, functional, and phylogenetic diversity measures (richness and Rao's Q) for plots. Diversity measures are in species equivalents (Hill's numbers).
files.label: Lopezetal2018_diversity_indices.tab

dataFile.description: Taxonomic, functional, and phylogenetic diversity measures (richness and Rao's Q) for plots. Diversity measures are in species equivalents (Hill's numbers).

files.description: Plant species phylogeny, created from PhytoPhylo phylogeny.
files.label: Lopezetal2018_phylogeny.tre

dataFile.description: Plant species phylogeny, created from PhytoPhylo phylogeny.

files.description: Measures of urbanization (amount of remaining forest, habitat fragmentation, urban environmental conditions, ornamental species cover) for each plot.
files.label: Lopezetal2018_predictors.tab

dataFile.description: Measures of urbanization (amount of remaining forest, habitat fragmentation, urban environmental conditions, ornamental species cover) for each plot.

files.description: Relative abundances of plant species in riparian forest plots, collected using a modification of the Carolina Vegetation Survey protocol. Data are means of cover estimates, relativized by total estimated cover of all species in the plot.
files.label: Lopezetal2018_relative_abundance.tab

dataFile.description: Relative abundances of plant species in riparian forest plots, collected using a modification of the Carolina Vegetation Survey protocol. Data are means of cover estimates, relativized by total estimated cover of all species in the plot.
